com.zhonghu.sip.api

类 SipManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhonghu.sip.api.SipManager

  • public final class SipManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage SIP application globally
    Define intent, action, broadcast, extra constants
    It also define authority and uris for some content holds by the internal database

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Possible presence status.

      • INTENT_SIP_CONFIGURATION

        public static final java.lang.String INTENT_SIP_CONFIGURATION
        Used to bind sip service to configure it.
        This method has been deprected and should not be used anymore.
        Use content provider approach instead
        另请参阅:
        SipConfigManager, 常量字段值

      • INTENT_SIP_SERVICE

        public static final java.lang.String INTENT_SIP_SERVICE
        Bind sip service to control calls.
        If you start the service using android.content.Context#startService(android.content.Intent intent) , you may want to pass EXTRA_OUTGOING_ACTIVITY to specify you are starting the service in order to make outgoing calls. You are then in charge to unregister for outgoing calls when user finish with your activity or when you are not anymore in calls using ACTION_OUTGOING_UNREGISTER
        If you actually make a call or ask service to do something but wants to unregister, you must defer unregister of your activity using ACTION_DEFER_OUTGOING_UNREGISTER.
        另请参阅:
        ISipService, EXTRA_OUTGOING_ACTIVITY, 常量字段值

      • INTENT_SIP_ACCOUNT_ACTIVATE

        public static final java.lang.String INTENT_SIP_ACCOUNT_ACTIVATE
        Shortcut to turn on / off a sip account.

        Expected Extras :

        • SipProfile.FIELD_ID as Long to choose the account to activate/deactivate
        • SipProfile.FIELD_ACTIVE - optional as boolean to choose if should be activated or deactivated

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ACTION_SIP_MESSAGE_RECEIVED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SIP_MESSAGE_RECEIVED
        Broadcast sent when a message has been received.
        By message here, we mean a SIP SIMPLE message of the sip simple protocol. Understand a chat / im message.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ACTION_SIP_CALL_RECORDED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SIP_CALL_RECORDED
        Broadcast sent when a conversation has been recorded.
        This is linked to the call record feature of CSipSimple available through ISipService#startRecording(int)

        Provided extras :

        • EXTRA_FILE_PATH the path to the recorded file
        • EXTRA_CALL_INFO the information on the call recorded

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ACTION_OUTGOING_UNREGISTER

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_OUTGOING_UNREGISTER

        另请参阅:
        EXTRA_OUTGOING_ACTIVITY, 常量字段值

      • ACTION_DEFER_OUTGOING_UNREGISTER

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_DEFER_OUTGOING_UNREGISTER
        Broadcast to send when you have launched a sip action (such as make call), but that your app will not anymore allow user to make outgoing calls actions.
        You have to pass registered EXTRA_OUTGOING_ACTIVITY
        另请参阅:
        EXTRA_OUTGOING_ACTIVITY, 常量字段值

      • ACTION_GET_DRAWABLES

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_GET_DRAWABLES
        Plugin action for themes.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ACTION_GET_PHONE_HANDLERS

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_GET_PHONE_HANDLERS
        Plugin action for call handlers.
        You can expect android.content.Intent#EXTRA_PHONE_NUMBER as argument for the number to call.
        Your receiver must android.content.BroadcastReceiver#getResultExtras(boolean) with parameter true to fill response.
        Your response contains :
        • android.content.Intent#EXTRA_SHORTCUT_ICON with android.graphics.Bitmap (mandatory) : Icon representing the call handler
        • android.content.Intent#EXTRA_TITLE with String (mandatory) : Title representing the call handler
        • android.content.Intent#EXTRA_REMOTE_INTENT_TOKEN with android.app.PendingIntent (mandatory) : The intent to fire when this action is choosen
        • android.content.Intent#EXTRA_PHONE_NUMBER with String (optional) : Phone number if the pending intent launch a call intent. Empty if the pending intent launch something not related to a GSM call.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ACTION_INCALL_PLUGIN

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_INCALL_PLUGIN
        Plugin action for call management extension.
        Any app that register this plugin and has rights to PERMISSION_USE_SIP will appear in the call cards.
        The activity entry in manifest may have following metadata
        • EXTRA_SIP_CALL_MIN_STATE minimum call state for this plugin to be active. Default SipCallSession.InvState.EARLY.
        • EXTRA_SIP_CALL_MAX_STATE maximum call state for this plugin to be active. Default SipCallSession.InvState.CONFIRMED.
        • EXTRA_SIP_CALL_CALL_WAY bitmask flag for selecting only one way. BITMASK_IN for incoming; BITMASK_OUT for outgoing. Default (BITMASK_IN | BITMASK_OUT) (any way).
        Receiver activity will get an extra with key "call_info" with a SipCallSession.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • EXTRA_SIP_CALL_MIN_STATE

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SIP_CALL_MIN_STATE
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ACTION_REWRITE_NUMBER

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_REWRITE_NUMBER
        Plugin action for rewrite numbers.
        You can expect android.content.Intent#EXTRA_PHONE_NUMBER as argument for the number to rewrite.
        Your receiver must android.content.BroadcastReceiver#getResultExtras(boolean) with parameter true to fill response.
        Your response contains :
        • android.content.Intent#EXTRA_PHONE_NUMBER with String (optional) : Rewritten phone number.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • EXTRA_OUTGOING_ACTIVITY

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_OUTGOING_ACTIVITY
        Tell sip service that it's an user interface requesting for outgoing call.
        It's an extra to add to sip service start as string representing unique key for your activity.
        We advise to use your own component name android.content.ComponentName to avoid collisions.
        Each activity is in charge unregistering broadcasting ACTION_OUTGOING_UNREGISTER or ACTION_DEFER_OUTGOING_UNREGISTER
        另请参阅:
        android.content.ComponentName, 常量字段值

      • EXRA_ACCOUNT_PROFILE

        public static final java.lang.String EXRA_ACCOUNT_PROFILE
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • EXTRA_SIP_CALL_OPTIONS

        另请参阅:
        ACTION_SIP_CALL_LAUNCH, 常量字段值

      • EXTRA_FALLBACK_BEHAVIOR

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_FALLBACK_BEHAVIOR
        Extra key to contain behavior of outgoing call chooser activity.
        In case an account is specified in the outgoing call intent with SipProfile.FIELD_ACC_ID and the application doesn't find this account, this extra parameter allows to determine what is the fallback behavior of the activity.
        By default FALLBACK_ASK. Other options :
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FALLBACK_ASK

        public static final int FALLBACK_ASK
        Parameter for EXTRA_FALLBACK_BEHAVIOR. Prompt user with other choices without calling automatically.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FALLBACK_PREVENT

        public static final int FALLBACK_PREVENT
        Parameter for EXTRA_FALLBACK_BEHAVIOR. Warn user about the fact current account not valid and exit. WARNING : not yet implemented, will behaves just like FALLBACK_ASK for now
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FALLBACK_AUTO_CALL_OTHER

        public static final int FALLBACK_AUTO_CALL_OTHER
        Parameter for EXTRA_FALLBACK_BEHAVIOR Automatically fallback to any other available account in case requested sip profile is not there.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        public static final int SUCCESS

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • CURRENT_API

        public static final int CURRENT_API
        Current api version number.
        Major version x 1000 + minor version.
        Major version are backward compatible.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
